headline.main: SAYRE TO AID LEHMAN AND ASSIST HULL; Accepts Dual Position in Foreign Relief Work

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 31 -- Francis B. Sayre, former High Commissioner to the Philippines, was appointed today deputy director of foreign relief and rehabilitation operations under former Governor Lehman. He will also serve as a special assistant to Secretary Hull.
